evidence.primary_indication: PET avid mediastinal nodes and RUL nodule.

31652.rationale: EBUS-TBNA sampling of 1-2 nodal stations (7 and 4R).

+31654.rationale: Radial EBUS for peripheral lesion (RUL nodule).

31623.rationale: Bronchial brushing (RUL nodule). Maintained as distinct service per protocol.

coding_review.note_level_rationale: Complex bronchoscopy combining mediastinal staging (31652) and peripheral nodule assessment. Peripheral assessment included Radial EBUS (+31654), TBLB (31628), and brushing (31623). All codes supported by documentation.

changes: Verified multi-modal sampling codes (31652, 31654, 31628, 31623) against v2.7 knowledge base.
